name: Globe & Mail | Clean and Readable 2008
description:
A Globe & Mail stylesheet that makes the site readable and cleaner.

Added: Improved typography, Helvetica Neue font, line-heights, larger font and wider content.  

Removed: Clutter, ads, top menu, subscriber links, more ads and the weather box.

This is a the second version of Globe and Mail / Cleaner 2007.
